sentences.sContent: As he cuddles with her, it feels like he’s doing the same with me — that’s how profoundly I feel we are all intertwined.
sentences.sContent_eng: As he cuddles with her, it feels like he’s doing the same with me — that’s how profoundly I feel we are all intertwined.
sentences.sCn: 当他搂住她的时候，感觉就像是他也在搂着我——这就是为什么我感到我们被深深地羁绊住了。

words.tran: 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的
